title: President Trump buys a Tesla
shortDescription: President Donald Trump bought a Tesla in show of support of Elon Musk and said it'll be used at the White House.

title: Columbia: Trump's funding cuts will impact 'critical' functions
shortDescription: University officials say they're committed to addressing the president's concerns that Jewish students felt unsafe on campus during protests.

title: House passes GOP funding plan as showdown looms in Senate over bill
shortDescription: The House passed a government funding bill, daring Senate Democrats to oppose it and risk a partial shutdown as stocks wobble.

title: About half of Trump's Education Dept. workers to be laid off
shortDescription: Roughly 2,100 Education Department staffers will start receiving layoff notices Tuesday, a Trump administration official said.

title: Trump poses with Tesla cars to show 'confidence' in Musk: See photos
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said earlier he would buy a Tesla as a 'show of confidence' for Elon Musk.

title: Trump reconsidering doubled tariffs amid Canada trade war
shortDescription: Donald Trump is reconsidering double planned tariffs after Ontario's premier said he would suspend an electricity surcharge on U.S. energy users.

title: Who is the Kentucky Republican Trump is threatening to oust?
shortDescription: President Trump blasted Rep. Thomas Massie, after the Kentucky congressman said he intends to vote no on proposed spending legislation.

title: Trump tariffs an 'unprovoked attack' on Canada, says power bill pol
shortDescription: Ontario Premier Doug Ford said President Donald Trump launched an “unprovoked attack” on Canada when he increased steel and aluminum tariffs.

title: Lawmakers want Trump administration to halt killing of barred owls
shortDescription: In a bipartisan letter to U.S. Department of Interior, 19 lawmakers asked the agency to halt a plan to kill 450,000 barred owls along the West Coast.

title: Mike Johnson on possible government shut down
shortDescription: Speaker Johnson said in a press conference that he believes the GOP has enough votes to keep the government funded.

title: Appeals court rejects Trump request to lift block on birthright order
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's order to halt automatic citizenship for children born to parents in the country without legal authorization is blocked again.

title: Trump promised a boom. Now he's bracing America for economic turbulence
shortDescription: Economic warning signs pile up as Trump pushes tariffs, DOGE cuts. Unemployment and inflation are up. Stocks and consumer confidence are down.

title: Hundreds protest Trump admin arrest of Columbia student Mahmoud Khalil
shortDescription: Student Mahmoud Khalil helped lead pro-Palestinan protests at Columbia University. Trump said such protests made campuses unsafe for Jewish students.

title: Fired fed workers are protesting weekly to lawmakers on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Fired federal workers are ramping up their weekly Tuesday protests on Capitol Hill demanding lawmakers take action

title: Trump reverses course, won't double tariffs on some Canada imports
shortDescription: Trump previously said he would increase from 25% to 50% tariffs for Canada after Ontario said it would raise electricity prices on U.S.
